showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ üöø The shower was clean with lots of hot water and good water pressure. ‚Ä¶

Just ridiculous this place very slow . Actually working all week drivers expect shower & they already took about 1 hour still I am 2 people behind was on 6 th guest & the gentleman talk to him said we have only 1 person maintenance but ‚Ä¶

Waited 6 hours for a shower. I was 5th in line. Only

5 showers cleaned in that time. Totally

unacceptable for truckers on the road. Poor service

‚Ä¶ . Today I drove for 8 hours and chose this truck stop to spend the night. I arrived at the location at 7:30 PM and went to use the shower. Upon entering, the staff member informed me that the shower would only be available at 11:15. This ‚Ä¶

They probably don't clean the shower here, there were six people in front of me. I've been waiting for 2 hours.I never got a shower. She said she was the only one with no one to clean and it turns out, I ordered a shower and it disappeared ‚Ä¶
Either understaffed or lazy ..... to get through 10 showers it takes 2.5hrs. Last shower to get cleaned took 1 hr (3 out of 4 are not in use)

‚Ä¶ quality team. I will not make any accusations. I was forcefully handled by an employee after wrongfully being accused of something outrageous by the shower attendant. I was denied my shower and authorities were called. Basically I was ‚Ä¶
Shower waiting time was more than 1 hour. All showers are open but nobody cares

‚Ä¶ staff is rude and has a boorish attitude. They sold me a shower, which I sold for 40 minutes, and when I asked what was wrong with my shower, they told me that there was no one cleaning the showers right now. Maybe they'll come in an hour.

‚Ä¶ The employees are rude and there is an extremely long wait for a shower even though there aren‚Äôt many drivers waiting for one. That tells me that the showers need cleaned and they‚Äôre too lazy to get to it. There‚Äôs no reason that there ‚Ä¶

Great parking options, even late. Customer service was pretty good, but the showers need work. Almost no pressure in shower and sink. Took awhile to even get toothpaste out of my toothbrush.  Toilet hadn't been cleaned, looked like it had ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I'm not judging... if you let your employees smoke weed, that's fine. But could you ask them not to smoke it in the showers? We truckers are drug tested and they're now putting my career in jeopardy.  I'm assuming the Hardee's workers are ‚Ä¶

They painted the showers today, probably to cover up the black mold a previous review showed pictures of, but did not bother putting up any notice. If I had known when I stopped here I could have gone down the road to a different truck stop ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ know which way around the garage to get to the pumps. Also the PA system is obnoxiously loud. You know, the one telling driver 90 ten times that his shower is ready.. even though driver 90 could easily just look at a monitor or his phone.
This loves need a major update. The showers have mold in them. It's also not the cleanest Loves either. I do not recommend stopping here for a shower.

‚Ä¶ . Hardee's was closed but someone said they're going to start staying open 24 hrs again. The showers had great hot water and they were clean. The shower head does face the back wall, so it was a tight fit for my fianc√© that's a big guy.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ to go. They run it better than most mom and pop places. They have a large parking lot that's mostly full at night, but you'll probably still find a parking space at nught here. Showers only cost $8. They have several shower rooms. The one I ‚Ä¶

Don't eat the meatloaf it tastes nasty. Ate the 18-wheeler well I'd eat that again. Place a bit run down tho. Sweet tea tastes like lemon was brewed with it. Gross! Anyway idk if I'd stop there to eat again. The Shower was ok clean in all.

Not overly disappointed with this stop, but I‚Äôve tried to shower twice now and there was no hot water. Had to ask for refund twice. I even waited for over 20 min with the water off still not even luke  warm. Would think for a truck stop ‚Ä¶

Got to my campground a little bit early this year, So the water is not on yet. Was looking for a nearby shower and they have them here! I was in room 4 And I thought it was a very nice clean bathroom. Very spacious. Definitely would shower ‚Ä¶

Politely asked for a shower they said it would be a little bit. They had one cleaning and maybe one that wasn‚Äôt in use 45 minutes later after three people had came out of the shower still standing there. These liberals looked at me like ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ here after 4pm than other stops. I didn't take advantage of the restaurant but it seemed clean and quaint. The shower was cheap enough and clean. I would've given a 5 star rating but the coffee was awful. You can see through it!  I've ‚Ä¶

One of the lowest prices on diesel fuel. Has a big lot for parking semis. Showers are ok. Nothing fancy, but does the job for a quick shower. Overall, it's clean and friendly. This is the second time I stop here for fuel, first time for a ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Seems like I can always find parking. The restaurant is pretty good and very friendly staff at the register. Shower needed much needed update and the be cleaned seriously but other than that was a perfect place for a 10 hour break.

‚Ä¶ options) wine and liquor and cheese for days. I didn't shower here but while they were cleaning the ladies room a shower was used temporarily and they looked fairly new and decent sized. Free in house WiFi with a driver's lounge upstairs.
Perfect place to be stuck at on a 34 hour reset.  Plenty of parking,  24 hour restaurant. beer and liquor,  ain't shower yet so cant speak on that yet

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be

showerReviews.reviewText: Bad place, so we stopped on aug 24th. They had no showers for that day because they only had 1 person at counter and nobody available to clean showers. Besides the Manager. So I go to get a shower next morning and cannot because my shower ‚Ä¶

At 9:13PM 7/29, the shower app wouldn't work. An employee at the register told me it was because none of the showers were clean and none would be ready until 10:00PM. I was so looking forward to a shower. Going to bed dirty.
A really good place to layover until your next drive shift. This TA don't proclaim to be the best, but they do make you feel right at home with food and a hot shower. It's a truck stop!

I'd give this one 0 stars if that was an option.  But we'll go with one!  Parking was ok, shower attendant was super nice.  That's where the decent stuff ends though.  No restaurant,  S*#t and toilet paper all over the floors & toilets both ‚Ä¶

There is no shampoo or soap for the shower then the towels stink too

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The place has anything and everything you can ever think or wish for. Open 24/7 its the one stop shop. Truckers heaven. Bathrooms, shower, restaurant, assorted truck stickers and such. Get everything you want!!!! Ill be back!!!!!! Enjoy!!!!

First time here but this a very nice truck. People are really friendly.  Great shower nice and hot. The only fault was restaurant needs to open a little bit longer. This place beats the pilot and love truck stops. Keep up the great work. I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the service was alright. The store though? Nope. The cashiers were rude. I had purchased fuel & went back in after parking & waiting for the customer base to slow to get a shower. There are 2 of us, but we share shower rooms since it is my ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ restaurant is great. Parking is okay kind of disorganized. What really bumped them down on the stars is the early morning employees don't clean the showers and wouldn't sell me a shower when requested. He said I had to wait until 7:00 when ‚Ä¶

This place was clean, the linens were gorgeous and super comfy. The Roman shower was perfect for my needs. I was staying there because I was having a consult at the University of MN. I took 1 star off because I was surprised by the $27 ‚Ä¶

Do not take a shower here. You can't breathe because of all the chemicals. It was miserable. So many of us are chemically sensitive or allergic to things. There was no air conditioning or air circulation in th ed shower stall. We did get a ‚Ä¶
